CREATE TABLE data (
                            chat_id INTEGER,
                            user_id INTEGER,
                            course INTEGER,
                            year INTEGER CHECK (year >= 1 AND year <= 5) DEFAULT 1,
                            detail INTEGER CHECK (detail >= 1 AND detail <= 3) DEFAULT 2,
                            curricula TEXT DEFAULT "000-000",
                            PRIMARY KEY (chat_id, user_id)
                            ) WITHOUT ROWID

CREATE TABLE courses (
                            course_name TEXT,
                            course_code INTEGER,
                            campus TEXT,
                            international INTEGER,
                            access TEXT,
                            site TEXT,
                            course_codec TEXT,
                            PRIMARY KEY (course_code)
                            ) WITHOUT ROWID

CREATE TABLE curriculas (
                            course_code INTEGER,
                            label TEXT,
                            code TEXT,
                            PRIMARY KEY (label),
                            FOREIGN KEY (course_code) REFERENCES data(course_code)
                            ) WITHOUT ROWID
